get.description: List all users in the project

value.message: Can not invite emails from outside your organization's domain (statsig.com) using the ConsoleAPI, recieved: invalid@outsideDomain.com
This endpoint only accepts an active CONSOLE key, but an invalid key was sent. Key: console-xxxXXXxxxXXXxxx

post.description: Invite a list of emails to your project. Note that console API does not send outgoing emails.

role.description: Can be one of 'Admin', 'Read Only', 'Member', or the name of any custom role.

requestBody.description:
Invited emails will be able to join the project with a selected role apon signing in. 
If your project is in an organization, only email domains that match the organization's domain may be invited to the project.
